meanings.definition: A family of calcium-dependent cysteine proteases involved in various cellular processes.
meanings.sent1: Calpains help cells by breaking down proteins when needed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study calpains to understand how cells work.
meanings.sent3: The calpains in the cell party all night breaking down proteins!
meanings.sent4: The calpains acted like tiny scissors, cutting through the proteins effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The image of calpains as cellular cleaners stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: Enzymes that play a role in cell signaling and protein degradation.
meanings.sent1: When cells need to send messages, they rely on calpains.
meanings.sent2: Protein degradation is a crucial function carried out by calpains.
meanings.sent3: The calpains in the cell signaling team always know the latest gossip.
meanings.sent4: In the cell, calpains are like the silent workers behind the scenes.
meanings.sent5: The importance of calpains in cell signaling cannot be overstated.
